RWC5020x API Library’s documentation¶

RWC5020x API Library controls the RWC5020x device remotely through RS232C using set of commands.

List of Commands¶

  • Common Commands
  • System Configuration Commands
  • Commands for RF Parameters
  • Commands for PROTOCOL Parameters
  • Commands for LINK
  • Commands for POW_TIME & POW_CH
  • Commands for SENSITIVITY
  • Commands for NST
  • Commands for SYSTEM
